title: Kpop Club
body:
Kpop has only 10 open spots remaining.

Requirement: Kpop-related name.

Add me in-game to be invited to the club.

[Orange Caramel](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x-5ckX2Ike4)

replies.body:
Added you, IGN: Stahri Night
Play on words with Ahri and Mamamoo song Starry Night

No need to explain.
I know all >:)

Added and welcome.
